demos.title: Simple Meter
demos.name: demo1
demos.description: This demo shows a meter with a value of 33. Do not forget to add an aria-label attribute to describe your meter.

demos.title: Simple Meter With Different Values Where Higher Is Better
demos.name: higher-is-better
demos.description: This demo shows four o-meter components with different values, where higher is better. HTML meter elements have min and max attributes, with a low and high range within. The optimum attribute indicates where along the min-max range is considered preferable.

demos.title: Simple Meter With Different Values Where Lower Is Better
demos.name: lower-is-better
demos.description: This demo shows four o-meter components with different values, where lower is better. HTML meter elements have min and max attributes, with a low and high range within. The optimum attribute indicates where along the min-max range is considered preferable.

demos.title: Meter With Optional Value Box
demos.name: demo2
demos.description: This demo show a meter with a value of 2.5 with an optional value box. Note that meter value and percentage can be different. Do not forget to add an aria-label attribute to describe your meter.

demos.title: Meter With Customised Colours
demos.name: demo3
demos.description: This demo shows a meter with a value of 25 that was colour-customised. Do not forget to add an aria-label attribute to describe your meter.

demos.title: Meter With Customised Dimensions
demos.name: demo4
demos.description: This demo shows a basic meter with a value of 25 with customised width and length. Do not forget to add an aria-label attribute to describe your meter.

demos.title: Meter With Value Box And Customised Dimensions
demos.name: demo5
demos.description: This demo shows a meter with a value of 25 with customised width and length. Do not forget to add an aria-label attribute to describe your meter.
